snippet.title: Rubi: The Wayward Mira - Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
Check out gameplay from combat to platforming, as well as a look at the world and more in this new trailer for Rubi: The Wayward Mira, as showcased during Guerrilla Collective 2021. Rubi: The Wayward Mira is a 2D action-platformer game based in a lush pixel world where science and magic come together. Featuring ability-based progression, Rubi is a Metroidvania at its core, but features nonlinear gameplay with multiple playstyles and endings.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
